General.Name: TWL Holdings Bhd
General.Description: TWL Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development and construction businesses in Malaysia. It operates through Trading, Property Development, Batching Plant, Plantation and Timber Services, and Others segments. The company is involved in the development of residential and commercial properties; production and sale of concrete mix and other concrete; and provision of site clearance, earthwork, and labour services of land area. It also engages in the property investment; wholesale of pharmaceutical and medical goods; manufacture and trade of wood-based products and timber concession products; and building materials and general trading activities, as well as provides money lending services and agricultural activities. In addition, it operates oil palm, cocoa, coconut, and rubber trees plantations. The company was formerly known as Tiger Synergy Berhad and changed its name to TWL Holdings Berhad in December 2021. TWL Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
